channel.title: MySQL on linzhaopeng
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on linzhaopeng

item.title: 查看 MySQL 查询执行计划
item.description: explain 可以分析查询语句的执行，即 MySQL 的执行计划，输出的信息如下： 建立测试数据表： CREATE TABLE `person` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `last_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `age` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `sex` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `l_f_a` (`last_name`,`first_name`,`age`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4; INSERT INTO `person` (`id`, `last_name`, `first_name`, `age`, `sex`) VALUES (1, 'Bryany', 'Julia', 1, '1'), (2, 'Bryant', 'Kobe', 35, '1'), (3, 'Allen', 'Rose', 15, '0'), (4, 'Allen', 'Kim', 18, '1'), (5, 'James', 'Tim', 4, '1'); CREATE TABLE `company` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `person_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4; INSERT INTO `company` (`id`, `name`, `person_id`) VALUES (1, 'a', 1), (2, 'a', 2), (3, 'b', 3), (4, 'c', 4), (6, 'c', 6); 1.
